MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Whitlow Avenue, Station View and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:51PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a further underground cable fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:00PM on 28th February 2021
